html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08052024-06-21FIN
ActBank Act
SubjectForm of Proxy (Banks and Bank Holding Companies) Regulations, 2023
PrecisFORM OF PROXY (BANKS AND BANK HOLDING COMPANIES) REGULATIONS, 2023 in order to (1) replace out-of-date references by provisions that directly reference National Instrument 51-102 (Continuous Disclosure Obligations); (2) add requirements to reflect the approach taken by the revised Canada Business Corporations Regulations and to incorporate the National Instruments; and (3) describe the circumstances whereby certain announcements and communications are not considered solicitation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0150 Publication Date: 2024-07-03
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: FORM OF PROXY (BANKS AND BANK HOLDING COMPANIES) REGULATIONS, 2023 in order to (1) replace out-of-date references by provisions that directly reference National Instrument 51-102 (Continuous Disclosure Obligations); (2) add requirements to reflect the approach taken by the revised Canada Business Corporations Regulations and to incorporate the National Instruments; and (3) describe the circumstances whereby certain announcements and communications are not considered solicitation.
